Nature of Mercy.quote: "The Lord is gracious and merciful, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love." (Psalm 145:8)

Mercy Attributes.quote: "Allah is the Most Merciful of the merciful." (Quran 12:92)

Divine Compassion.quote: "The Buddha of Infinite Light and Infinite Life responds with boundless compassion to all beings." (Larger Sutra of Immeasurable Life)

Paths of Mercy.quote: "Mercy and truth have met together; righteousness and peace have kissed." (Psalm 85:10)

Mercy Practice.quote: "Be merciful, just as your Father is merciful." (Luke 6:36)

Ocean of Mercy.quote: "The ocean of God's mercy is infinite and boundless." (Sri Ramakrishna)

Mercy Qualities.quote: "The quality of mercy is not strained; it droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven." (Shakespeare, The Merchant of Venice)

Forms of Mercy.quote: "In every act of kindness, divine mercy flows." (Rumi)

Mercy Gates.quote: "The gates of mercy are never shut." (Talmud, Berachot 32b)

Mercy Powers.quote: "By His mercy He makes us see, by His mercy we receive wisdom." (Guru Granth Sahib)

Mercy Effects.quote: "Mercy transforms both giver and receiver." (Catherine McAuley)

Mercy Purpose.quote: "That they may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need." (Hebrews 4:16)

Mercy Teachings.quote: "Blessed are the merciful, for they shall receive mercy." (Matthew 5:7)

Mercy Relations.quote: "Let us then with confidence draw near to the throne of grace." (Hebrews 4:16)

Mercy Process.quote: "From His fullness we have all received, grace upon grace." (John 1:16)

Mercy Experience.quote: "Taste and see that the Lord is good." (Psalm 34:8)

Mercy Dimensions.quote: "The height and depth, length and breadth of divine mercy surpass understanding." (Ephesians 3:18-19)

Mercy Benefits.quote: "His mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning." (Lamentations 3:22-23)

Mercy Symbols.quote: "The rainbow shall be in the cloud, and I will look on it to remember the everlasting covenant." (Genesis 9:16)

Mercy Knowledge.quote: "To know divine mercy is to know the heart of God." (St. Faustina)

Mercy Covenant.quote: "I will be merciful toward their iniquities, and I will remember their sins no more." (Hebrews 8:12)

Mercy Mission.quote: "Go and learn what this means: 'I desire mercy, not sacrifice.'" (Matthew 9:13)

Mercy Promise.quote: "Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life." (Psalm 23:6)

Mercy Invitation.quote: "Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest." (Matthew 11:28)

Mercy Heritage.quote: "From generation to generation His mercy is on those who fear Him." (Luke 1:50)

Mercy Presence.quote: "The Lord is near to all who call on Him in truth." (Psalm 145:18)
